awards.name: Distinguished paper
awards.description: Award for the most notable paper, as determined by the PC chairs based on the recommendations of the program committee.

awards.name: Distinguished artefact
awards.description: Award for the artefact most significantly exceeding expectations, as determined by the AEC chairs based on the recommendations of the artefact evaluation committee.

awards.name: Distinguished reviewer
awards.description: Award for the programme committee member that produced the most useful reviews as assessed by paper authors.

awards.name: Most Influential Paper
awards.description: Award for the SLE 2015 paper with the greatest impact, as judged by the SLE Steering Committee.

awards.name: COLA Award
awards.description: 2024 Journal of Computer Languages Best Paper Award
